name: GUM Technique Deep Clean Toothbrush - Compact Head - Soft Toothbrushes for Adults with Sensitive Soft Bristles, 3 Count
short_description: HEALTHIER TEETH & GUMS TECHNIQUE DEEP CLEAN 525R3: Our extra soft toothbrushes for adults remove dental plaque and prevent the development of tooth decay by effectively cleaning areas both above and below the gum line and between the teeth.
Compact Soft : The Compact Soft toothbrush comes with a compact head size for easy maneuverability and soft bristles that are tough on plaque but gentle on enamel and gums.

DEEP CLEANING : Get a deeper clean with the GUM Technique adult toothbrush. Our extra soft toothbrush features fine tapered bristles that are scientifically proven to reach deeper into narrow oral spaces than traditional round bristled toothbrushes.
ERGONOMIC HANDLE : Each soft bristle toothbrush comes with our trademarked Quad-Grip handle to encourage PERFECT brushing technique for the most effective plaque removal possible.

HEALTHY STARTS HERE : Research continues to show the connection between oral health and overall health. The GUM brand is committed to providing innovative care products that make between teeth cleaning accessible for everyone.
product_description: Product Description Do you want healthier gums, cleaner teeth, and fresher breath? With the GUM Technique Deep Clean toothbrush, getting that “dentist-office” clean feeling at home has never been easier. Each Technique Deep Clean toothbrush features a Quad Grip handle that makes it easy to achieve perfect brushing technique. This revolutionary handle is designed with contours that help you intuitively hold the brush exactly the way most dental professionals do - at 45 degrees. Soft, fine tapered bristles provide a deeper, more effective clean. Independent studies have shown that the unique bristles on the Technique Deep Clean toothbrush reach several times deeper into hard-to-access areas below the gumline and between the teeth than the normal, round-ended bristles on other toothbrushes. Features : Fine tapered bristles for more effective plaque removal. Ergonomic handle that promotes perfect brushing technique Compact head size. Soft bristles that are safe for sensitive gums and enamel. Dental professionals recommend that you brush twice daily to remove plaque between the teeth and beneath the gum line and replace your toothbrush every 3 months. name: Sea Turtle Plant-Based Bristles, Bamboo Toothbrushes, Soft Natural Toothbrush for Adults (4 Pack)
short_description: 100% Profits DONATED - the income from your purchase goes directly to planting trees in USA through our partnership with US Forest Service and National Forest Foundation, supporting unhoused children across the globe, and doing good work we were called to do. This ensures that more is put back than taken out from our earth.

FSC Certified – Sea Turtle provide products certified by Forest Stewardship Council (FSC C041262). Our products come from well-managed forests, ensuring no deforestation, while providing fair wages and work environments.

100% Plant-Based Bristles – Made entirely from castor beans (USDA Bio-Preferred #65739), our Sea Turtle toothbrush bristles offer an eco-friendly alternative to traditional nylon. Unlike conventional bristles, they require a short break-in period—after just a few uses, they soften to their optimal level, ensuring a comfortable and effective brushing experience.

Pack of 4 Numbered – Doctors recommend changing your toothbrush every season. A pack of 4 is perfect for the entire year! You can also share the 4 pack of bamboo toothbrushes for each person in your household. The toothbrushes are individually numbered making them great for sharing!

Minimal Packaging - We know the last thing our customers want is excessive packaging. That is why we package our Bamboo Toothbrushes inside a single recyclable box. Bristles bent during shipping? Simply soak the bristles in hot water to retain the original shape!
